name: sort_numbers_in_list
description: Create a Scratch program that asks the user to input 5 numbers one by one, adds them to a list, sorts the list in ascending order, and then says the sorted numbers joined by spaces.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that asks the user to input 5 numbers one by one, adds them to a list, sorts the list in ascending order, and then says the sorted numbers joined by spaces.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: sort_numbers_in_list
